Pertuzumab administer load dose 840 mg intravenously ( iv ) , 420 mg iv 3-weekly , trastuzumab load dose 8 mg/kg iv , 6 mg/kg iv 3-weekly , docetaxel 75 mg/m^2 iv , increase 100 mg/m^2 iv 3-weekly , FEC carboplatin iv 3-weekly standard dos . Following surgery participant receive trastuzumab 6 mg/kg iv 3-weekly total 1 year , well adequate chemo- , radio- hormone therapy .
